contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | image = Japalura polygonata.jpg | image_caption = ''[[Japalura polygonata]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Agamidae]] | subfamilia = [[Agaminae]] | genus = '''''Japalura''''' | genus_authority = Gray, 1853 }} [[File:A lizard in Taiwan 2.JPG|thumb|''[[Japalura swinhonis]]'']] '''''Japalura''''' is a genus of [[lizard]]s in the family [[Agamidae]]. They are native to [[Pakistan]], [[India]], [[Myanmar]], [[China]], [[Vietnam]], [[Taiwan]], and [[Japan]]. China has the most species,<ref name=kunte>Kunte, K. and U. Manthey. (2009). [http://biodiversitylab.org/index/images/website/KunteMantheyJapalura09.pdf Rediscovery of ''Japalura sagittifera'' (Sauria:Agamidae) from the eastern Himalayas, Arunachal Pradesh: An addition to the Indian herpetofauna.] ''Sauria'' 31(2) 49-55.</ref> including many [[endemism|endemics]].<ref name=mah>Mahony, S. (2009). [http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/2009/f/z02212p061f.pdf A new species of ''Japalura'' (Reptilia:Agamidae) from northeast India with a discussion of the similar species ''Japalura sagittifera'' Smith, 1940 and ''Japalura planidorsata'' Jerdon, 1870.] ''Zootaxa'' 2212 41-61.</ref> There are about 26 species.<ref name=kunte/><ref name=mah/> Species include: *''[[Japalura andersoniana]]'' *''[[Japalura brevicauda]]'' *''[[Japalura brevipes]]'' *''[[Japalura chapaensis]]'' *''[[Japalura dymondi]]'' *''[[Japalura fasciata]]'' *''[[Japalura flaviceps]]'' *''[[Japalura grahami]]'' *''[[Japalura hamptoni]]'' *''[[Japalura kaulbacki]]'' *''[[Japalura kumaonensis]]'' *''[[Japalura luei]]'' *''[[Japalura major]]'' *''[[Japalura makii]]'' *''[[Japalura micangshanensis]]'' *''[[Japalura otai]]''<ref name=mah/> *''[[Japalura planidorsata]]'' *''[[Japalura polygonata]]'' *''[[Japalura sagittifera]]'' *''[[Japalura splendida]]'' *''[[Japalura swinhonis]]'' *''[[Japalura tricarinata]]'' *''[[Japalura varcoae]]'' *''[[Japalura variegata]]'' *''[[Japalura yulongensis]]'' *''[[Japalura yunnanensis]]'' ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Agamidae]]
